Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any known facts.
Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information.
Understate: The claim does not understate any information.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at any point.
Lack enough support: The claim is supported by specific figures from tax returns.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not contain any problematic assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided for the tax figures mentioned in the claim.
